item.title: Insights into global planktonic diatom diversity: The importance of comparisons between phylogenetically equivalent units that account for time
Publications
item.description: Google Scholar Preprints Nakov T, Beaulieu JM and Alverson AJ. Freshwater diatom lineages diversify faster than marine in both planktonic and benthic habitats. Preprint at bioRxiv, p.406165 Onyshchenko A, Ruck EC, Nakov T, Alverson AJ. A single loss of photosynthesis in diatoms. Accepted, American Journal of Botany. Preprint at bioRxiv, p.298810 Papers 2018 Nakov T, Beaulieu JM and Alverson AJ. Insights into global planktonic diatom diversity: The importance of comparisons between phylogenetically equivalent units that account for time.
